info.title: Question Service Service API

post.description: Create the question list specified within the body of this request. The created question list will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newQuestionListV1
parameters.description: A new question list to be created.

get.description: Retrieves the question list specified by the key provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the question list to get.

put.description: Replace quesiton list specified by the provided key. The updated question list will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the question list to replace.

parameters.name: newQuestionListV1
parameters.description: A question list to replace the existing question list.

delete.description: Delete the question list specified by the provided key.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the question list to delete.

patch.description: Update question list specified by the provided key. The updated question list will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the question list to update.

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: A JSON patch describing the updates to the question list.

get.description: Retrieves the page of question lists specified by the keys provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: Keys of question lists to get.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.summary: Get question lists by section key.
get.description: Retrieves the question list specified by the section key provided.

parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: sectionKey
parameters.description: Section key of the question list to get.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term. Searches key, prompt, and notes.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

createdOn.description: When the question list was created.

key.description: Unique key of the question list. Maximum 40 characters.

notes.description: Notes for the question list. Maximum 1000 characters.

prompt.description: The prompt for the question list. Maximum 1000 characters.

sectionKey.description: The key of the section to contain this question list.

sortOrder.description: The sort order of the question list.

status.description: The status of the question list.

updatedOn.description: When the question list was last modified.

key.description: Unique key of the question. Maximum 40 characters.

notes.description: Notes about question, can be used for tagging for search

options.example: Property, Liability, Liquor, Assault and Battery

prerequisitePrompt.description: The prerequisite prompt for the question. Determines whether the main prompt is relevant. Must be a binary question that can be answered with yes or no.

questionListKey.description: Corresponding Question list key for the question

sectionKey.description: Corresponding section key of the question.

sortOrder.description: The sort order for the question

updatedOn.description: When the question was last modified.
